Welcome to RegistrationMagic v3.5.2
As always, we are bringing a number of new features to newest edition of RegistrationMagic. And all along, it is you - the end user, who is guiding us to every subsequent release. So if you need a new feature, want to report a bug or just speak up your mind, please use the contact form on our website.
Editable Forms
Users can now edit fields after submissions, including fields in User Accounts section. To make a field editable check ALLOW USERS TO EDIT THIS FIELD AFTER SUBMISSION in field settings.
WP Login Inside MagicPopup
Apart from existing OTP login, the Magic Popup now supports proper WP login. No extra configuration needed.
Force Email or Username
Now you can force system to use either Username or Email exclusively for logging into your site. Registration forms will automatically reflect the change.
Silver
Gold
Boolean Filters
New boolean filters make it easier for you to find submissions. These new filters include Notes, Attachments, Payments, Read, Unread and Blocked.
Gold
Custom Links in MagicPopup
Add upto 3 custom links (URLs or pages) to your MagicPopup menu to truly make it your own! Links can be bound to user roles. Configuration in Global Settings.
Silver
Gold
Respond to Submissions
Now you can manually respond to individual submissions inside the Submission Manager. Each response is attached as a separate note.
Silver
Gold
Read/ Unread Submissions
Each new submission is marked unread and displayed in bold inside Submission Manager. It is automatically marked read after opening.
Gold
Quickly Block IP/ Email
It is easier than ever to block an IP or Email from submission page with a single click of the button.
Gold
Submission PDF in Notification
Submission PDF will now be attached to admin notification email.
Silver
Gold
Apart from these, this release is full of bug fixes and minor improvements.
